description: The need for relevant and responsive health-care that improves people's health outcomes means that medical schools need to be accountable for what and how they teach. Medical schools are responsible for training health practitioners who can help improve the health of individuals and societies.
title: How medical schools can be more accountable to society through community connections

description: A proposal to create Germany's biggest motorway has sparked a backlash, with critics fearful the "monstrosity" will increase climate-damaging emissions, worsen noise pollution and harm biodiverse habitats.
title: Highway to hell? Plan for Germany's biggest motorway sparks anger

description: Around 9,000 people have been evacuated in northeastern Canada because of raging wildfires, officials said Saturday.
title: 9,000 evacuated in northeast Canada due to wildfires

description: The latest dinosaur being mounted at the Natural History Museum in Los Angeles is not only a member of a new species—it's also the only one found on the planet whose bones are green, according to museum officials.
title: Gnatalie is the only green-boned dinosaur found on the planet. She will be on display in LA
